inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic with angina pectoris, dyspnea or exercise-induced syncope or near syncope
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Anticipated usage of biological aortic valve prosthesis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Low risk for conventional surgery (STS Score <4%)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Suitable for both SAVR and transfemoral TAVR
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy >1 year after the intervention
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent to participate in the study after adequate information about the study before randomization and intervention
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Coronary artery disease, not suitable for both percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) or coronary artery bypass graft surgery (CABG)
exclusion.label: not_met
